name: Kung-Kiu Lau
content: Homepage for Kung-Kiu Lau Home Page for Kung-Kiu Lau I am a senior lecturer in the School of Computer Science at the The University of Manchester. My contact details are as follows: Postal Address: Kung-Kiu Lau School of Computer Science The University of Manchester Manchester M13 9PL United Kingdom Phone: +44 161 275 5716 Fax: +44 161 275 6204 Email: kung-kiu.lau at manchester.ac.uk Research Currently my main research area is Component-based Software Development. See my research page for details. I lead the Component-based Software Development research group at Manchester. A list of PhD projects that I offer can be found here. Research Projects I was Principal Investigator on: the CESAR project the EMC2 project Both were European projects funded by the ARTEMIS Joint Undertaking. Publications A list of some of my publications can be found here. Book Series on Component-based Software Development I am the series editor of a book series on Component-based Software Development, published by World Scientific. Journal Editorial Boards I am a member of the editorial board of: the Journal of Applied Logic (scientific area editor: Logic and Software Engineering) the Journal of Universal Computer Science ESOCC 2014 I was General Chair of: The Third European Conference on Service-oriented and Cloud Computing (ESOCC), 2-4 September 2014, Manchester, UK. ESOCC 2013 I was Programme Co-Chair of: The Second European Conference on Service-oriented and Cloud Computing (ESOCC) , 11-13 September 2013, Malaga, Spain.
